name: basic-memory
tagline: A self-hosted knowledge base for storing and organizing notes and text snippets
description: Basic Memory is a minimal self-hosted knowledge base and text snippet vault. It allows users to save, search, and organize information using a clean, markdown-powered web editor, prioritizing speed and privacy.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Clean markdown-powered writing interface. Beautiful formatting

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find information quickly with powerful search. Instant retrieval

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted for complete data privacy. Your knowledge, your control

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage and fast performance. Efficient design

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Native Linux application for optimal performance. Smooth experience
